title: Chytozavryk
desc:
It's an application designed to encourage children to read through engaging quizzes.

The project features:

  • ✔️ A functional parent dashboard: allows parents to monitor their children's progress and achievements.
  • ✔️ A bright and intuitive children's dashboard: lets kids independently choose quizzes, track their achievements, and view rewards, boosting their motivation and interest in reading.
  • ✔️ "Chytozavryks": cute characters that serve as rewards for successfully completing quizzes.
  • ✔️ An admin panel: provides a user-friendly interface for managing content and tracking the app's performance.

title: StatusAC
desc:
It's a user-friendly web application for a law firm

Key features implemented:

  • ✔️ Interactive sliders provide a dynamic way to showcase content, such as images or testimonials, allowing users to navigate through different items with smooth transitions.
  • ✔️ Appointment Booking System: Implemented a booking feature that allows users to easily schedule appointments with legal professionals directly through the website, ensuring smooth and convenient scheduling.
  • ✔️ Admin Panel: An easy-to-use admin panel that allows the firm to manage content, track website performance, and ensure the site remains up-to-date with the latest legal information.

title: IPhone 15 Website
desc:
This is a clone of Apple's iPhone 15 Pro website using React.js and TailwindCSS. It highlights the effective use of GSAP and Three.js for displaying iPhone 15 Pro models in various colors and shapes.

Features:

  • ✔️ Smooth Animations using GSAP: Enhanced user experience with seamless and captivating animations powered by GSAP.
  • ✔️ 3D Model Rendering with Different Colors and Sizes: Explore the iPhone 15 Pro from every angle with dynamic 3D rendering, offering various color and size options.
  • ✔️ Custom Video Carousel: Engage users with a unique and interactive video carousel developed using GSAP for a personalized browsing experience.
  • ✔️ Completely Responsive: Consistent access and optimal viewing on any device with a fully responsive design that adapts to different screen sizes.

title: Business Coach Website
desc:
This is a business coach website using React.js and TypeScript. It highlights the effective use of GSAP (Greensock Animations) for animations.

Features:

  • ✔️ Beautiful Subtle Smooth Animations using GSAP: Enhanced user experience with seamless and captivating animations powered by GSAP.
  • ✔️ Completely Responsive: Consistent access and optimal viewing on any device with a fully responsive design that adapts to different screen sizes.
  • ✔️ Testimonials Carousel (crafted with GSAP): Enhance user engagement with an interactive testimonials carousel built using GSAP, providing a personalized and immersive browsing experience.

title: Travella
desc: A dynamic and visually appealing Next.js-powered landing page for a travel agency. Leveraging TypeScript for enhanced type safety and maintainability, I crafted a seamless user experience using SCSS for styling and GSAP for captivating animations.

title: AI Email
desc: This project represents a personal endeavor, with the primary objective being the enhancement of my proficiency in Next.js, alongside a focused improvement of my SCSS and animation skills.

title: Digital Product Studio
desc: This project represents a personal endeavor, with the principal objective being the advancement of my proficiency in Next.js alongside the refinement of my CSS/HTML skills.

title: Game Haven
desc: Gave Heaven is a dynamic e-commerce platform designed to cater to gaming enthusiasts across the globe. This PET project was developed collaboratively by a small, passionate team dedicated to honing our skills and expanding our expertise in web development. This project was an exciting venture undertaken by a small, dedicated team aiming to enhance our skills in web development.

title: Cat For Future
desc: The primary objective of the website is to facilitate the adoption of cats by finding them new homes. It incorporates functionalities such as the reservation and cancellation of cat adoptions, user registration, and authentication. Furthermore, my role in the project was to develop an administrative panel for content management, implement authentication and registration processes, and integrate the website with third-party APIs.
